text: The 1984 Campeonato Nacional was Chilean football league top tier’s 52nd season. Universidad Católica was the tournament’s champion, winning its fifth title. The champion was decided by a small final tournament (Liguilla). ==North Zone== ===Standings=== ===Scores=== ===Interzone=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; float:left; margin-right:1em;" |- |width="50"|FVI |width="30"|0–1 |width="50"|CSA |width="30"|1–1 |- |width="50"|ANT |width="30"|0–1 |width="50"|NAV |width="30"|4–0 |- |width="50"|SLU |width="30"|2–0 |width="50"|EVE |width="30"|0–1 |- |width="50"|SWA |width="30"|1–1 |width="50"|UES |width="30"|3–0 |- |width="50"|IQU |width="30"|1–0 |width="50"|RAN |width="30"|1–1 |- |width="50"|ARI |width="30"|3–2 |width="50"|OHI |width="30"|3–0 |- |width="50"|CLO |width="30"|4–0 |width="50"|COQ |width="30"|0–2 |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;float:left; margin-right:1em;" |- |width="50"|LSE |width="30"|0–0 |width="50"|GCT |width="30"|3–1 |- |width="50"|UCA |width="30"|1–0 |width="50"|PAL |width="30"|1–1 |- |width="50"|COL |width="30"|1–0 |width="50"|UCH |width="30"|2–0 |- |width="50"|MAG |width="30"|3–1 |width="50"|HUA |width="30"|1–0 |- |width="50"|ATA |width="30"|0–0 |width="50"|TRA |width="30"|1–0 |- |width="50"|SFE |width="30"|1–1 |width="50"|AUD |width="30"|4–4 |} ==South Zone== ===Standings=== ===Scores=== ==Relegation play-off== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- |width="70"|Audax I. |width="30"|3–0 |width="70"|Trasandino |} ==Championship Liguilla== == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Víctor Cabrera||Regional Atacama||18 |} ==See also== * 1984 Copa Polla Gol == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1984 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Primera
